about_the_game:
Join Cora West for a whirlwind of forbidden romances found in the depths of a decadent illegal jazz club in Prohibition-era Los Angeles. Decide if she can make it out with her heart intact or lose herself in the glamor and excess.

Will you fall in love? Rule the city?

Or damn it all and descend into ruin?

The choice is yours.

Speakeasy is a story-rich otome visual novel with a female protagonist. Each route contains several erotic scenes with fully uncensored accompanying CGs.

Within the game is a common route and six possible romance routes: four routes with single male love interests, one sapphic love interest, and one polyamorous route with two male love interests. All routes are unlocked at the start of the game and there is no requirement to complete certain routes to unlock others. Routes may be played in any order, but it's recommended to play Vincent Harlowe last.

The game has 19 possible ends and approximately 35 hours of gameplay to collect all possible scenes, endings, and CGs.

The main character can be customized with four different skin tone selections (appearing in CGs and in the on-screen sprites), and the name can be customized.

Forced into an arranged marriage, Cora West rebels against the norms of her class and runs away, intent on forging her own path in life. But she quickly finds herself falling directly into the laps of some of the city’s most notorious citizens.

What Cora encounters outside the iron gates and manicured lawns of the West Estate in Prohibition-era Los Angeles is a bright, exciting, and equally dangerous city pulsing to the beat of jazz music and drowning in the illegal liquor of the most decadent underground clubs around. Vincent Harlowe’s speakeasy is beyond her wildest dreams–and sometimes even her worst nightmares.

Direct her actions and determine whether she will make it out with her heart intact or lose herself in the glamor and excess.

Speakeasy is an R18 game that features dark and mature subject matter. Depicted within the game are: tobacco use, alcohol use, drug use, violence, prostitution, nudity, explicit sexual content, death (including murder and suicide), kidnapping, humiliation, violence, sexual assault, child abuse, and adultery.

content_descriptors.notes: Speakeasy features dark and mature subject matter. Depicted within the game are: tobacco use, alcohol use, drug use, violence, prostitution, nudity, explicit sexual content, death (including murder and suicide), kidnapping, sexually charged humiliation, and adultery. Content that is discussed but NOT depicted in the game include: child abuse, queerphobia, sexual assault, and wartime atrocities.

detailed_description:
SPEAKEASY V2.0 IS NOW AVAILABLE!

A new version of SPEAKEASY is here! Completely rebuilt in a new game engine, V2.0 features:

  • Optimization to run smoothly and seamlessly, while using a quarter of the storage space as the previous version

  • A new CG gallery, with images sorted by character and featuring a “Sexual Content On/Off” toggle

  • Updated UI, including new text box with additional navigation features and a new in-game menu

  • Updated sound design, with in-game and menu navigation sound effects

  • Rewritten scenes to provide more content for players utilizing the “Sexual Content OFF” mode

  • Keyboard, mouse, and controller compatibility

  • Accessibility options, including:  

    • text-to-speech

    • choice between default or OpenDyslexic fonts

    • text size and line space scaling

    • high contrast text option

  • New settings options:

    • play in full screen or window mode

    • adjust text speed

    • adjust auto-forward speed

    • adjust music and sound effects volume

    • options to fast skip through unseen text and transitions

WHAT TO KNOW

Save files and unlocked CGs will not transfer from the old version to Speakeasy V2.0.

Because V2.0 is running on a different game engine, saved items from the old version are not compatible.

Speakeasy V2.0 will replace the older version on Steam.

Steam will automatically update to the new version for players who have already purchased Speakeasy. Players who wish to have a copy of an older version can contact Open Late Games support.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04+
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz 64-bit Intel-compatible
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Sierra 10.10+
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz 64-bit Intel-compatible (Apple silicon supported through Rosetta 2)
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

name: Speakeasy

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1 or higher
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz 64-bit Intel-compatible
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.0 or DirectX 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: A delightful, delicious, devilish erotic visual novel.
